Ichigo was sprawled out on his couch in his pajama's, as he had been for the past week, shoving greasy potato chips into his gaping mouth. The house, or rather the living room and kitchen. was a mess of food wrappers because Ichigo was too lazy to clean up. Not that he cared of course, he was becoming a slob. But, as he was on the couch, someone came to the door...

A knock on his door snapped Ichigo out of stuffing his face. He didn't wanna get up and stop eating, but he figured who ever was here, wouldn't leave until he let them in. Getting up, and farting while he did so, Ichigo made his way to the door and opened it. "Hey Ichigo! What's shaking?" There stood Renji Abarai in all of his idiotic glory. "Oh, hey Renji, come on in." Ichigo let Renji in and went back to the couch and stuffing his face. As Renji came in he immediately covered his nose. "Dude, it stinks in here, what the hell." Ichigo just shrugged at his statement and continued to shove his latest bag of food into his mouth, which happened to be pork rinds.

Renji uncovered his nose, deciding that he would just have to deal with the smell. Turning to Ichigo, Renji actually looked at him. This wasn't the Ichigo he had hung out with last week. Something had happened, but he wasn't sure what. "Hey Ichigo, what's wrong with you?" Ichigo stopped stuffing pork rinds into his mouth and looked at Renji. "What do you mean what's wrong? Nothings wrong with me." Ichigo's sentence ended, and in its place a huge fart erupted which Ichigo smiled proudly at. Renji however, just covered his nose. "No wonder why it fucking stinks in here. Do you just let those off all the time?" Ichigo looked at Renji like he had grown a second head. "Well, yeah. I don't see what's wrong with it though. The more rank a fart, the more masculine I am." Renji shook his head. This was definitely not Ichigo.

114112.content:
Renji gasped. He had no idea what was in that syringe and he had just injected himself with whatever had remained. That could not be good. What if that had been what turned Ichigo into that stinky thing downstairs? Renji grunted and pulled the syringe from his hand. “Alright Renji, keep it together. No need to freak out over this.” He put the syringe in Ichigo’s waste basket, just in case. He didn’t need a repeat of what just happened.

Well, nothing was happening yet, so he should probably go back downstairs to check on Ichigo. He needed to find out what was going on fast, before that serum took effect. “If it even has an effect.” Renji began moving towards the door when he swayed slightly on his feet. “Well I guess it’s fast acting, of course it would be.” Renji stumbled backwards a bit and tried to orient himself. He swayed towards Ichigo’s bed, before collapsing onto it. Might as well be comfy while he was passed out.

When Renji woke up he felt groggy. “Man, how long was I out for? I feel like crap.” Renji slowly sat up in Ichigo’s bed and noticed that something felt a little off. It felt as if something was between his stomach and his lap. Moving his hand to the area where he felt the obstruction, he was met with warm skin. Looking down Renji started to freak out. “What the fuck, I’ve become a fatty!” It seemed that serum was what had turned Ichigo into a slob of a teenager. He noticed that he wasn’t as big as Ichigo was, but he was still quite chubby. He estimated that Ichigo had a good 60lbs over him now. He assumed that put him somewhere around the 200 mark.

Renji noticed that his new weight wasn't the only change that had happened to him. He was also quite furry now as well. Before he had passed out, Renji was confident that his body was completely hairless. Now he had a thick layer of red fuzz that covered his entire body. It made it hard to see some of his tattoos in places. He noticed that his armpits seemed quite bushy, and he could see tufts of red pit hair coming from his arm hole. "Man, I hate body hair. I was hairless for a reason! I think I hate this more than the goddamn weight!" Renji pulled at a few stray body hairs in irritation, wincing when he tugged too hard.

Renji sighed. "Oh well, I guess his room was a total bust, I mean look what happened to me." He was about to leave the room for a second time when he stopped. It felt like he needed to do something. He scratched his head in confusion. "I did what I came up here to do, though." He took a quick scan around the room just to make sure. His gaze stopped on Ichigo's clothes hamper for some odd reason. Once he saw it he began moving towards it almost on autopilot.

"Why the hell did I come over here, it's just Ichigo's dirty clothes." There were more clothes around the hamper than in, but that didn't stop Renji from beginning to rummage through the clothes. He found his prize and held them up to his face: a used pair of Ichigo's briefs. He turned them around to look at the seat of them. There were a lot of skid marks and the seat looked kind of worn. Considering these were at the bottom of the hamper, they must have been from before Ichigo became like this. "Geeze Ichigo, who knew you were such a dirty guy?"

What Renji did next surprised even him. He put the briefs over his head, seat facing nose, and took a deep whiff. "What, what the heel am I doing!?" He took another long whiff. "I can't fucking stop, they smell too good!" He inhaled a few more times, almost moaning a few times he did so. "Fuck, Ichigo. Your ass is amazing." After sniffing a few more times, he reluctantly took Ichigo's underwear from his head. He was going to put them back in the hamper, but Renji shoved them in his back pocket instead. "What the fuck, I've become an underwear sniffer. Is this some form of the slob transformation? Shit, I better check up on Ichigo now!" He finally left Ichigo's room, and headed downstairs.

15213.content:
While Shuuhei was walking through town he noticed an ad up for a new hot spring. It seems they were running a promotion where you got bonuses on top of the admission prices. It seemed one of the bonuses was a massage at no extra cost. “Man that would be awesome. I’m still a little sore from that hollow fight.” But then he remembered the little predicament that was happening with his midsection. If the hot springs were busy, then everyone would see his new belly. But that massage sounded so good. He was in quite the pickle.

That hollow he had fought had been stronger than usual. He wondered if it might have been one of Aizen’s rejects from way back in the day. If it was, then that would provide an explanation for what he was experiencing right now. “Aha, that’s it! I’ll just tell people this was done by an Aizen hollow and R&D is looking into it!” This would allow him to save face if he was questioned about his body. He really did need to go to R&D eventually to have the scientists look at him, but that could wait. “Oh man! I’m so excited for that massage! My aching body needs it!” With a huge smile Shuuhei went in the direction the ad told him too.

When he arrived at the hot springs Shuuhei was honestly expecting a little more. For being a new hot spring, this place looked very modest in every way. Shuuhei shrugged, as long as he got his massage he didn’t care what the place looked like. The receptionist greeted him when he entered with a smile. “Welcome to Lazy Days Hot Spring! Are you here for the promotion we’re currently putting on?” Shuuhei nodded.”That massage sounds too good to pass up!” The receptionist smiled in response. “We’re also doing a free lunch as well as the massage, so today is your lucky day! But price of admission is 20 dollars.”

Shuuhei paid the meager fee and followed the receptionist’s directions to the change room. It seemed he was the only one in the change room right now. He picked a corner and began to strip off his clothes. Before tying the towel around his waist, Shuuhei inspected his new belly. It had gotten a little bigger, but not by much. If he had to guess, Shuuhei would say he gained maybe 20lbs. He gave the small belly a tiny shake and frowned to himself. “You are so annoying. I’m a lieutenant with a beer gut. How disgraceful.”

Shuuhei tied the towel around his waist and proceeded to head out towards the spring. The way his towel was tied it made his belly a tad more prominent as it sort of overhung on the towels edge. The first thing Shuuhei noticed was that this hot spring was rather steamy. It seemed the water gave off a natural steam which has surrounded the entire area. “Uh hey, is there anyone here?” There was no response to Shuuhei’s query. With a grin Shuuhei felt a bit mischievous. He undid the towel from around his waist and sat in the spring buck naked. “Man, this feels so good.” This water and steam was making him feel more relaxed than he’d ever felt.

Shuuhei’s hands absentmindedly went to his new gut as he began to rub it, the hot spring making all his worries fade away for the time being. He didn’t even notice that he gained a little bit more weight while he was rubbing his belly. He was content to just sit here for the time being.

His eyes traveled down to his hip bones. Once again he had noticed a slight bruising of the area, bruising that he knew came from the bony ass of his lieutenant and partner, Gin Ichimaru.
Being cadaverous, Gin was both pale and thin, which one he was more of, Aizen was not too sure. He had always found the younger man attractive, and admire his skills and abilities. The most dearing part about him is that Aizen knew Gin would follow him until the sands of Hueco Mundo were lost in the wind.
A smirk grew on Aizens face as he felt the skeletal arms of his awoken lover around his waist."Ain't ya coming back to bed Aizen Sama?" Gin asked as his gaze locked on to where Sosukes' hands were. "ya know we could'a stop anytime..."

"Gin..." Aizen shot the smiling man a quick glance.

Gin lowered himself to his knees and softly bit the tissue on Aizen's hip bone, he then gave it a quick peck. "But I guess Cap'n Aizen wouldn't want that, now would he?"

Aizen pulled himself away from gin and walked towards the doors of his chambers grabbing a robe along the way. As he opened the door he turned back and said "I have something to work on, I suggest you not follow me this time around. I'll shall see you in the morning." and with that Aizen shut the door and was on his way.

Gin stood himself up and was both pleased and confused. Aizen was bothered by something Gin had done but still wanted to have their morning tea together. This was the pleasing part. however, what confused Gin is that he was instructed not to follow. Normally Aizen would simply have wandered off knowing it was useless to try and tell Gin to stay put. Could this mean Aizen was working on something even he could not know about? Perhaps he would tell him in the morning? The only thing Gin was sure of is that he'd best not bother the man and his work, not tonight anyways.

In the morning Gin made his way to the private planning room of Aizen, which was often used for their morning tea sessions. Morning tea sessions had been something Aizen had introduced Gin to when he entered the Gotei 13. Though Gin had liked tea he never really had any interest in ceremonies or sessions, if he wanted tea he would drink it when ever he wanted and how ever he liked it. However Gin had been interested in Aizen and wanted to be around him as often as possible when he was younger. Now it had become second nature for the two men to engage in a morning tea session.

Gin open the door to the room and poked his head in. He scanned the room and smiled. As expected the tea was already prepared and waiting on the ivory white table across the room. But where was Aizen, Gin wondered as he walked in. Gin approached the table and took his usual spot. When he did that he heard Aizen Sosuke's voice.

"Good Morning Gin. Tell me, how was your sleep last night?" the man asked as he joined the younger man.
"s'alright Captain." Gin replied
"That's good to hear." Aizen began to pour a coup of tea, when finished he handed it to Gin. "Gin, I want you to try that tea and tell me how it taste."
"oh? is it new?" Gin asked.
"yes it is, I made it last night. Go on, try it." Aizen leaned in and placed his chin on his hands and smiled as he watched Gin place the cup to his lips and sip the tea.
A moment later and Gin placed the empty cup down on the table. Gin was blown away, What he just drank had to have been the best tea he had ever had. It was warm, not too hot nor too cool, and had a very smooth feel to it as it dived down his throat. His favorite part though was the flavor.
"Persimmons," Aizen said. "I know they are your favorite so I decided to make this tea."
Gin blushed, this was something only Aizen could make happen, and even then only once in a while.
"D'aww, Just for little ol' me? I'm flattered That Captain Aizen knows me so well and would do something so thoughtful." Gin teased, He made it sound as if Aizen were normally a cold lover, Aizen however was the opposite. He was very thoughtful and caring... towards Gin anyways. Though he had to admit it was for his own selfish reasons. He had Gin, who was a very skilled and even frightening opponent for anyone, emotionally attached to him. He also had his own desires that everyone else had, and it just so happened that Gin fulfilled them. Aizen could not believe how amazing sex was with Gin and how skillful the silver haired man had been with his tongue. The only downside was how thin gin was, Aizen would not have minded a bit more meat on his lieutenant in bed.
Thankfully during the night Aizen was able to formulate a concoction that he hopes will put a few pounds on his skeletal lover.

Gin had just finished drinking his second cup of tea. He really did enjoy it and could not resist the taste of his favorite fruit. He sat back in his chair and stared at the man in front of him. He wasn't to sure, but he knew that this act of kindness, just like in the past, would lead up to something that Aizen wanted, he just didn't know what.

1553322221.content:
Ichigo sighed and snuck another look at his father. Isshin was currently in an animated conversation with one of his daughters over something or another. Looking at him like this, it was hard to believe that his dad used to be a captain of the 13 Court Guard Squads. Of course, with him being banished that no longer stood, but Ichigo had witnessed his power first hand so it was hard to write off. It frustrated him that his dad had hidden this from him for so long. He understood why his father did what he did, but that didn't mean that he had to like it. If it involved his mom, he should have known dammit!

He just wished, now more than ever, that his dad could be a normal dad. Isshin had never really fit the mould of what a father should be or look like, according to Ichigo. According to several different types of people, Isshin was what you would call a ‘hot dad.’ The girls at Ichigo’s high school would constantly ask to come home with him, just to catch a glimpse of his dad. Hell, even a few boys had asked as well. He would get stopped on the street by several women, them asking if his dad was currently open to dating. It was pretty ridiculous to say the least.

Ichigo never saw the hot dad aspect of his father. Sure, he understood why people thought he was hot, but he himself never saw it. Dads should be normal, average, and more mild-mannered. Not boisterous and excitable like his dad was. They shouldn’t be ‘muscled sex gods’ either. Also, dads shouldn’t keep such serious secrets from their kids. Ichigo wished he could just make his dad normal. Also, if he had to have a hot dad, why couldn’t Isshin be Ichigo’s type of hot dad! It wasn’t fair!

Ichigo blushed, what he wouldn’t give for his dad to be his type of hot dad. Isshin was already halfway there too. He had the scruff and the hairy body, Isshin just had way too many muscles to go with them. If he just shed his ripped stomach and put on a nice dad gut, then Ichigo would enjoy staring at his dad for hours. Maybe if his dad acted more like a dad, then his body would follow suit. Isshin had a tremendous amount of energy, which is what allows him to look the way he does. Without that, Isshin would not have the motivation to constantly keep his body in tiptop shape.

It was a fools errand though. How would he get his dad to lose the majority of his energy. There was also the fact that Isshin’s entire life and personality would have to be changed around as well. Ichigo sighed, it was nice to think about these things at least. There’s no way that it could actually happen.
1553322221.title: Thoughts on Dad

15533222212.content:
While he was out shopping the other day a mysterious shopkeeper had stopped Ichigo. He said he knew about Ichigo's inner desires and he knew how to make them come true. Deciding to humour the man, Ichigo went to the stand to check things out. The shopkeep placed a gold pendant into Ichigo's hands. "You know how to use it and what it is for. Yourn father will never see it coming." Ichigo looked at the man flabbergasted. How had he known of his secret desires? He was about to question the shopkeeper but when he looked up he was gone. Ichigo was very confused. Aw well, he might as well try it, it couldn't hurt.

-

Ichigo reached into his pocket and pulled out a small, golden pendant, one he had just gotten along a back alley at the marketplace earlier that day. The seller, whom Ichigo was sure was an unproclaimed witch doctor, had assured him that the pendant in his hand had some mystical properties, ones that Ichigo was itching to take advantage of. “Whatcha got there, son?” Isshin suddenly said interrupting Ichigo’s train of thought; now was his chance. “It’s just something I got at the market today,” Ichigo said casually, holding the pendant up to show his father like nothing was out of the ordinary. Ichigo began to swing the pendant gently back and forth. “Hey, keep it still so I can see it,” Isshin said, following the pendant back and forth. When after a few seconds Ichigo had still not stopped rocking his new find back and forth, Isshin opened his mouth to reprimand his boy, but the words only bubbled out as an incoherent stammer. He couldn’t take his eyes off the pendant, and the more in rocked back and forth, the less anything else seemed to matter around him. His arms slowly slide down to his sides, as he felt his breathing slowing.

“That’s it, father, keep staring,” Ichigo said in a calming tone despite the devilish grin spreading wide across his face. Isshin felt his jaw slacken and his vision narrow, allowing him to only see one thing; the pendant. A blackness fell over his thoughts with the pendant acting as a beacon, illuminating the emptiness of his head. Suddenly, a voice cut through to his mind, one that he didn’t just want to listen to, but one that he needed to listen to. “That’s better,” Ichigo said, seeing the blank stare on his father as he continued to swing the pendant back and forth. He had been a little skeptical of the proclaimed hypnotic powers of the charm, as you always had to make a leap to trust a witch doctor, but apparently, he had been told the truth. Now his father stood before him like a moldable piece of clay, ready to heed and act on anything suggestion or command that he gave him. Ichigo grinned; he knew exactly what to say: “Isshin, you will no longer be a polite, stick of a man. You despise being thin and you despise good table manners because you love food. You love eating food to the point that you can’t physically eat more, yet you still do. You eat to get bigger, you eat to get larger, you eat to get fatter. You want nothing more than to pack as much fat onto your slobby frame as possible. You will give up your warrior lifestyle and instead simply laze around on your rump eating all day every day. You live for food and love the fat that it packs onto your body.” Isshin merely stared ahead as Ichigo spoke, absorbing every word his son spoke like it was the gospel from an all-powerful deity.

“Do you understand?” Ichigo asked, pleased to see his father nod his head up and down. “Good.”
